post:
Réseau Web Alternative was created in Québec (Canada) 2005 with a very specific mission: to provide an alternative to commercial web hosts and offer services such as web hosting and internet related services.

Réseau Web Alternative is your human partner for professional services. Our goal is not to make mass web hosting as most other hosts, but to have a reasonable number of users to be close to them and be able to help and support them.

Our servers are located in:
▸▸ Montréal (CA)
▸▸ Lenoir (US)
▸▸ Amsterdam (NL)
▸▸ Roubaix (FR)
▸▸ Amsterdam (NL) (-Flexible DMCA Policy-)


Payment Options: We accept PayPal, Bitcoin, Credit Card (through PayPal), Western Union, MoneyGram and Bank transfer (via HyperWallet) for payments.

All our prices in this post are in Canadian dollars (CAD) (http://www.xe.com/currencyconverter/convert/?Amount=1&From=USD&To=CAD)

SPECIAL OFFERS / COUPONS
